amendment.description: An amendment numbered 17 printed in Part B of House Report 116-154 to require the Director of National Intelligence, in consultation with other relevant agencies, to study the threat of international mobile subscriber identity-catchers, also known as cell-site simulators, to U.S. Government personnel and national security and provide a report and policy recommendations to Congress.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kinzinger amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kinzinger amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Kinzinger.
